name: Build Mana Compiler

on:
  push:
  pull_request:

jobs:
  build-windows:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup MSBuild
        uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.1

      - name: Build Solution
        run: msbuild mana-lang.sln /p:Configuration=Debug
